channel.title: typesetting on Supriya Dutta
channel.description: Recent content in typesetting on Supriya Dutta

item.title: Bondeep, Bonoshreehotor Golpo - book design
item.description: OVERVIEW My father has been writing short tales for children and publishing them in local Assamese publications for as long as I can remember. “Bondeep, Bonoshreehotor Golpo” (Bondeep, Bonoshree’s Tales) is a collection of short stories created and collected to raise awareness about the preservation of our natural environment. I consider myself fortunate to have assisted him with the typesetting andÂ design of this book. The book will be available at local bookstores on December 6, 2022.

item.title: My friend Mr Leakey - book design
item.description: OVERVIEW Author J. B. S. Haldane and his book My Friend Mr Leakey always fascinated me. It has been one of my favorite books. During my Master’s we were asked to redesign any of our favorite books. It came as a perfect opportunity to design it in a way I imagined the world of Mr Leakey would look like. I hope you enjoy this design as much as I loved working on it! Snapshots of the book Illustrations within FIN.
